Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.View

Interface UI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLI, GUI
    public interface UI
    Interface for standardize the behaviors of the various UI (CLI and GUI).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void askPowerUsage()
      Asks the player if wants to use the power.
      void buildTower​(boolean[][] allowedBuild)
      Asks the player in which position he wants to build.
      void changeWorker​(boolean canChangeWorker)
      Gives to the player the chance to change the worker selected.
      void chooseFirstPlayer()
      Manages the choice of the first player.
      void chooseGameGods()
      Manages the choice of the Gods that will be used in the game.
      void chooseGod​(java.util.ArrayList<God> godList, java.util.ArrayList<God> unavailableList)
      Shows the God cards used in the game and those already chosen.
      void chooseNumPlayers()
      Asks to choose how many players are wanted in the game.
      void chooseRemoval​(boolean[][] allowedToRemove)
      Asks the player in which position he wants to remove a building.
      void chooseServerAddress()
      Asks the player the address of the server.
      void chooseUsername()
      Asks to choose the username.
      void chooseWorker()
      Asks the player of the position in which wants to move the selected worker.
      boolean confirmChoice()
      Asks the player if he wants to choose another worker.
      void disconnectedFromServer()
      Shows an alert when the player is disconnected from the server.
      void errorServerAddress()
      Manages not valid username error.
      void godChoiceError()
      Manages not valid god choice.
      void invalidMove()
      Warns the chosen move is not valid.
      void isWinner​(java.lang.String winner)
      Shows the name of the winner.
      void moveOtherWorker​(boolean[][] allowedMoves)
      Asks the player to choose where he wants to move the other(selected) worker.
      void moveWorker​(boolean[][] allowedMoves)
      Asks the player to choose where he wants to move the selected worker.
      void noPossibleMoves()
      Warns there aren't more possible moves for the player.
      void opponentDisconnected()
      Shows an alert when an opponent disconnected.
      void otherWorker()
      Warns the player that the worker chosen could't be moved, so he will move the other worker.
      void placeWorkerInSpace​(int currentWorker, boolean[][] allowedPositions)
      Shows where the player can put the selected worker and then he inserts the chosen coordinate.
      void playerError()
      Manages not valid first player choice.
      void printAllPlayers​(Player[] players)
      Shows all the players of the lobby.
      void printCurrentBoard​(Game updatedGame)
      Shows the current status of the game board.
      void printCurrentStatus​(Game updatedGame)
      Shows the legend of the players in the game: username, color of the workers and God chosen.
      void printLobbyStatus​(int selectedLobby, int slotsOccupied, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> usernames)
      Shows the lobby status.
      void printPossibleAction​(boolean[][] allowed)
      Shows all the possible moves of the respective worker.
      void showGodList​(java.util.ArrayList<God> gods)
      Shows all the God cards of the deck.
      void showLastGod​(java.util.ArrayList<God> godList, God lastGod)
      Shows the God cards used in the game and the last God available.
      void startNotification​(GameStartNotification message)
      Notifies the game can start (the lobby is full).
      void usernameError()
      Manages not valid username error.
      void workerChosenError()
      Manages not valid worker selection.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseServerAddress

        void chooseServerAddress()
        Asks the player the address of the server.

      • errorServerAddress

        void errorServerAddress()
        Manages not valid username error.

      • chooseUsername

        void chooseUsername()
        Asks to choose the username.

      • usernameError

        void usernameError()
        Manages not valid username error.

      • chooseNumPlayers

        void chooseNumPlayers()
        Asks to choose how many players are wanted in the game.

      • printLobbyStatus

        void printLobbyStatus​(int selectedLobby,
                      int slotsOccupied,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> usernames)
        Shows the lobby status.
        Parameters:
        selectedLobby - number of the lobby, it can be 2 or 3 depending on the selected players.
        slotsOccupied - Number of players in the lobby at the moment.
        usernames - Usernames of the player in lobby.

      • startNotification

        void startNotification​(GameStartNotification message)
        Notifies the game can start (the lobby is full).
        Parameters:
        message - Notification of game start.

      • showGodList

        void showGodList​(java.util.ArrayList<God> gods)
        Shows all the God cards of the deck.
        Parameters:
        gods - ArrayList of Gods.

      • chooseGameGods

        void chooseGameGods()
        Manages the choice of the Gods that will be used in the game.

      • printAllPlayers

        void printAllPlayers​(Player[] players)
        Shows all the players of the lobby.
        Parameters:
        players - array of Players.

      • playerError

        void playerError()
        Manages not valid first player choice.

      • chooseFirstPlayer

        void chooseFirstPlayer()
        Manages the choice of the first player.

      • chooseGod

        void chooseGod​(java.util.ArrayList<God> godList,
               java.util.ArrayList<God> unavailableList)
        Shows the God cards used in the game and those already chosen.
        Parameters:
        godList - ArrayList of all the Gods chosen for the game.
        unavailableList - ArrayList of Gods already chosen, so not available.

      • godChoiceError

        void godChoiceError()
        Manages not valid god choice.

      • showLastGod

        void showLastGod​(java.util.ArrayList<God> godList,
                 God lastGod)
        Shows the God cards used in the game and the last God available.
        Parameters:
        godList - ArrayList of all the Gods chosen for the game.
        lastGod - last God available.

      • placeWorkerInSpace

        void placeWorkerInSpace​(int currentWorker,
                        boolean[][] allowedPositions)
        Shows where the player can put the selected worker and then he inserts the chosen coordinate.
        Parameters:
        currentWorker - integer that identifies the selected current worker.
        allowedPositions - the boolean matrix of the allowed spaces where the player can position his worker.

      • chooseWorker

        void chooseWorker()
        Asks the player of the position in which wants to move the selected worker.

      • workerChosenError

        void workerChosenError()
        Manages not valid worker selection.

      • confirmChoice

        boolean confirmChoice()
        Asks the player if he wants to choose another worker.
        Returns:
        true if the player chooses to confirm the same worker, false if he wants to change it.

      • moveWorker

        void moveWorker​(boolean[][] allowedMoves)
        Asks the player to choose where he wants to move the selected worker.
        Parameters:
        allowedMoves - the boolean matrix of the allowed moves.

      • otherWorker

        void otherWorker()
        Warns the player that the worker chosen could't be moved, so he will move the other worker.

      • moveOtherWorker

        void moveOtherWorker​(boolean[][] allowedMoves)
        Asks the player to choose where he wants to move the other(selected) worker.
        Parameters:
        allowedMoves - the boolean matrix of the allowed moves.

      • printPossibleAction

        void printPossibleAction​(boolean[][] allowed)
        Shows all the possible moves of the respective worker.
        Parameters:
        allowed - the boolean matrix of the allowed moves.

      • changeWorker

        void changeWorker​(boolean canChangeWorker)
        Gives to the player the chance to change the worker selected. and allows the player to choose where he wants to move his worker.
        Parameters:
        canChangeWorker - Boolean value indicating the possibility of the player to change worker.

      • buildTower

        void buildTower​(boolean[][] allowedBuild)
        Asks the player in which position he wants to build.
        Parameters:
        allowedBuild - the boolean matrix of the spaces where the player is allowed to build.

      • askPowerUsage

        void askPowerUsage()
        Asks the player if wants to use the power.

      • chooseRemoval

        void chooseRemoval​(boolean[][] allowedToRemove)
        Asks the player in which position he wants to remove a building.
        Parameters:
        allowedToRemove - the boolean matrix of the spaces where the player is allowed to remove a building.

      • noPossibleMoves

        void noPossibleMoves()
        Warns there aren't more possible moves for the player.

      • invalidMove

        void invalidMove()
        Warns the chosen move is not valid.

      • printCurrentStatus

        void printCurrentStatus​(Game updatedGame)
        Shows the legend of the players in the game: username, color of the workers and God chosen.
        Parameters:
        updatedGame - is the current instance of the Game class.

      • printCurrentBoard

        void printCurrentBoard​(Game updatedGame)
        Shows the current status of the game board.
        Parameters:
        updatedGame - is the current instance of the Game class.

      • isWinner

        void isWinner​(java.lang.String winner)
        Shows the name of the winner.
        Parameters:
        winner - winner's name.

      • opponentDisconnected

        void opponentDisconnected()
        Shows an alert when an opponent disconnected.

      • disconnectedFromServer

        void disconnectedFromServer()
        Shows an alert when the player is disconnected from the server.
